sourceMeaningMnemonic: Social commentary aside, the <radical>white</radical> <radical>king</radical> is the king that wears all white. Traditionally, this is someone better than a king. The <kanji>emperor</kanji>!
meaningInfo: See the emperor, garbed all in white. There are other kings, but the emperor's white clothing shows his status above the rest.
readingMnemonic: Who is the <kanji>emperor</kanji>? It is <ja><reading>こう</reading>いち</ja>. <ja>こういち</ja> the emperor stands over his subjects.
readingInfo:
How did <ja>こういち</ja> become emperor?! His first decree as emperor is that everybody must learn kanji now.

Note: from now on, Emperor <ja>こういち</ja> will be a recurring character for the reading mnemonic of <ja>こう</ja>.
